key.name: pos-x
key.description: The saved horrizontal position of the window

key.name: pos-y
key.description: The saved vertical position of the window

key.name: window-width
key.description: The saved width of the window

key.name: window-height
key.description: The saved height of the window

key.name: current-uri
key.description: The page to load when NAWVi starts, remembers from when you exited
